code: import*as Api from"./Api";const getRequest=url=>{return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){const obj={url:url,onSuccess:resp=>{resolve(resp);},onError:err=>{reject();console.log('api error',err);}};Api.get(obj.url,obj.onSuccess,obj.onError);});};const PutRequest=(url,data)=>{return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){const obj={url:url,data:data,onSuccess:resp=>{resolve(resp);},onError:err=>{reject();console.log('api error',err);}};Api.put(obj.url,obj.data,obj.onSuccess,obj.onError);});};const PostRequest=(url,data)=>{return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){const obj={url:url,data:data,onSuccess:resp=>{resolve(resp);},onError:err=>{reject();console.log('api error',err);}};Api.post(obj.url,obj.data,obj.onSuccess,obj.onError);});};export const demoFetch=()=>{const url=`/demoroute`;return getRequest(url);};
